title: Remote monitoring and artificial intelligence in treating patients with heart failure

content:

title: FinMin Stresses On Fostering Use of AI with Regulation

title: Is AI repeating social media’s mistakes? Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis warns against ‘move fast and break things’ mentality
description: Google DeepMind CEO and Nobel Laureate Demis Hassabis has warned that artificial intelligence must avoid repeating the mistakes of social media, which prioritized engagement over user wellbeing. Speaking at the Athens Innovation Summit, he highlighted risks such as addiction, mental health issues, and the formation of echo chambers, citing studies showing AI can replicate these patterns. Hassabis urged responsible deployment, scientific testing, and international cooperation to balance innovation with safety as AI becomes increasingly embedded in society.
content:
